motion_summary: The magnifying glass remains stationary in the center-left, while the focus within it shifts to highlight different sections of the stock chart. The human finger and keyboard remain static in their respective positions.
summary_text: A human finger uses a magnifying glass to examine a stock chart displayed on a screen, with a keyboard visible in the background. The focus shifts from a general overview to a detailed inspection of specific price trends, particularly a recent upward movement.
